member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintOption.CompatibleModeClientAreaOnly
member.summary: Prints the currently visible client area only using the compatible method.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintOption.CompatibleModeFullWindow
member.summary: Prints the currently visible form including title bar and borders using the compatible method.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintOption.ClientAreaOnly
member.summary: Prints the currently visible client area only.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintOption.FullWindow
member.summary: Prints the currently visible form including title bar and borders.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintOption.Scrollable
member.summary: Prints the full client area including areas scrolled out of view.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintOption
member.summary: Specifies which portions of a Windows Form is printed and how the image is captured.

member.name: E:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.BeginPrint
member.summary: Occurs when the Print method is called and before the first page of the document prints.

member.name: E:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.EndPrint
member.summary: Occurs when the last page of the document has printed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.QueryPageSettings
member.summary: Occurs immediately before each PrintPage event.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Form
member.summary: Returns or sets the form that is printed

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintAction
member.summary: Returns or sets a value that determines if the Print method prints to the printer, file or the PrintPreview component

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintFileName
member.summary: Returns or sets the filename of the file to print to (System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintFileName).

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrinterSettings
member.summary: Returns or sets PrintSettings for the underlying PrintDocument's (System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings).

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print
member.summary: Prints the visible client area of the top most window.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.Print(System.Windows.Forms.Form,Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.PrintOption)
member.summary: Prints the specified Windows Form using the specified printing options.
member.param: Specifies how the form will be printed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.OnBeginPrint(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint event. It is called after the System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print method is called and before the first page of the document prints.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.OnEndPrint(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint event. It is called when the last page of the document has printed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.PowerPacks.Printing.PrintForm.OnQueryPageSettings(System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings event. It is called immediately before each System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage event.
